Solitary Balemoon in a Sky of Fading Stars.

value.name: All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear
value.desc:
Arlecchino: All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear

"Everlasting as the moon."

value.text: Reward for inviting Arlecchino to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc:
"Dire Balemoon" Arlecchino

Solitary Balemoon in a Sky of Fading Stars.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"As a 'father,' it's important to keep up with the games my children like to play."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Arlecchino's deck focuses on Normal Attacks and Bonds of Life and allows her to deal significant damage when buffed.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc:
"Dire Balemoon" Arlecchino

Solitary Balemoon in a Sky of Fading Stars.

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc:
"Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette

The firmament glimpsed in a reflected moon.

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc:
"Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet

Alone under the cold light of stars.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

Arlecchino: All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear

"Everlasting as the moon."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"No wonder the children are always talking about this game... A variety of factors have an impact on the course of each match, and unexpected turns are never far away. An interesting pastime, indeed."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Arlecchino" starts with the Talent Card "All Reprisals and Arrears, Mine to Bear" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Arlecchino: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Deal 2 <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> . If possible, consume up to 3 stacks of the target's <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> and increase DMG by the same amount.
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s</color> <color=#ffffff>): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Create 5 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Blood-Debt Directive</color> on the opponent's side of the field and deal 2 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Blood-Debt Directive</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After your character receives DMG:</color> Attach 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> to the character who took DMG and the opponent's Arlecchino.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 5</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deal 4 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> . Remove all of your stacks of <color=#ffffff>Bond of Life</color> and heal yourself for 1 HP per stack.
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
Characters won't receive healing from sources other than <color=#ffffff>Balemoon Rising</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When Bond of Life is attached to self:</color> <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt by characters is converted to <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Bond of Life</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
